alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 3:58AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Florence, Georgetown, northwestern Horry, Marion and Williamsburg Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 357 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms centered near Rhems, or 18 miles northwest of Georgetown, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Marion, Lake City, Mullins, Kingstree, Andrews, Johnsonville, Pamplico, Quinby, Hemingway, Sellers, Rhems, Blue Brick, Cades, Oatland, Nesmith, Rains, Morrisville, New Hope and Galivants Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
